attributes.action: Ensure all MPs comply with UK law and are not above the law especially with regard to Capital Gains Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since when have MPs been above the law. Are Benefit in Kind , capital gains tax, mileage allowance laws not applicable to MPs.

When are we going to get police or Inland Revenue prosecution

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
